import { useContext } from "react" import Global from "../../context/Global" import { PostType } from "../../types/Interfaces" import { Card } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button" import classes from './Post.module.css' interface PostProps extends Omit { className?: string, isAuthor?: boolean, } const Post = ({postTitle, postBody, authorLogin, createdDate, className}: PostProps) => { const {localStore} = useContext(Global) return (

{authorLogin}

{createdDate}

 {postTitle} {postBody} ) } export default Post
